name: Attack on Titan 2 - Additional costume for Mikasa "One-piece Dress" Costume
detailed_description:
Bonus

The following bonus will be downloadable for free until August 1, 2019: - Additional costume for Christa "Queen Historia" Costume - Additional costume for Kenny "Coat (Young Male)" Costume - Additional costume for Levi "Plain Clothes (Underground City)" Costume - Additional costume for Mikasa "One-piece Dress" Costume Note: These items are available during the period from July 5, 2019 - August 1, 2019. Please beware that after the aforementioned period the content will not be available for download, regardless of the purchase date.


About the Game

A new costume for Mikasa is added. ▼How to use You can access the new costume by performing either of the following: ・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Mikasa. Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field. ・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Mikasa in the Daily Life section, or approach her at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the B Button when you are near Mikasa. Note: This additional content can only be used with "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle" or in an environment for which the "Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack" has been applied.
